dependencies.description:
GMP is a free library for arbitrary precision arithmetic, operating on
signed integers, rational numbers, and floating-point numbers.
dependencies.name: gmp

dependencies.description:
The MPFR library is a C library for multiple-precision floating-point
computations with correct rounding.
dependencies.name: mpfr

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Python wrapper for the Sollya library
dependent_to.name: py-pythonsollya

description:
Arbitrary-precision correctly-rounded floating-point arithmetic, via
MPFR.
name: py-bigfloat

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
